erc7730_structured_data_signing.highlight: ERC-7730 draft V2 ready for public review; JSON metadata enriches ABI for human-readable transaction display
7730 file has three sections: context (contract binding), metadata (contract info), display (formatting rules)
Registry governance under discussion; migrating from Ledger GitHub to Ethereum Foundation soon
Audit/verification system for 7730 files needed to prevent malicious contract misrepresentation

clear_signing_proposal.highlight: Kalapaja proposes on-chain clear signing with cryptographic commitment to display metadata
Solution uses 'clear call' wrapper (~7-8k gas overhead) validating display hash on-chain
Push-based semantics work without real-time dependencies; supports offline hardware wallets
Composable design enables multi-sig wrappers without additional hardware wallet integration
Live demo shown: dApp→mobile wallet→hardware device via NFC with native view rendering

rpc_versioning.highlight: RPC team exploring endpoint-level versioning; seeking wallet feedback on backward compatibility requirements

encrypted_mempool.highlight: EIP-8105 proposed as Hegotá headliner: encrypted mempool to prevent front-running via key providers
Two-step execution: gas payment in block N, decryption and execution in N+1
Wallet changes needed: key provider selection, encryption flow, double signing, two-block confirmation tracking
